title: BIM Technology Utilization Competency Enhancement Program for Architecture, Engineering, and Construction Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic theories and practical experience in architecture/engineering/construction fields
context.additional_context: Establishing Practical Learning Environments with Digital Devices (Tablets, Laptops, etc.) and Team-Based Collaborative Learning Grounded in Real-World Project Cases

learning_goals: Acquiring the ability to perform 3D modeling and data management by utilizing core features of BIM software.
Experiencing a collaborative process to solve real-world construction project problems through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Strengthening communication competencies across the entire lifecycle (design, construction, and maintenance) based on BIM.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
